official_title: A bill to declare Leach Lake, Cass Lake, and Winnibigoshish Lake in the State of Minnesota to be nonnavigable waters for certain purposes.

summary.text: Declares Leech Lake, Cass Lake, and Winnibigoshish Lake in the State of Minnesota to be nonnavigable waters.

titles.title: A bill to declare Leach Lake, Cass Lake, and Winnibigoshish Lake in the State of Minnesota to be nonnavigable waters for certain purposes.
